<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function handles the shadowing of GPRs for fp and vector types,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and is a depiction of the algorithm described in the ELFv2 ABI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Section 2.2.4.1: Parameter Passing Register Selection Algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26" lineLink="#a21db8f9e0318e72f5b8aa856aa52d8b7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a21db8f9e0318e72f5b8aa856aa52d8b7">CC&#95;PPC64&#95;ELF&#95;Shadow&#95;GPR&#95;Regs</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;ValVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;LocVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45">CCValAssign::LocInfo</a> &amp;LocInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> &amp;ArgFlags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;State) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The 64-bit ELFv2 ABI-defined parameter passing general purpose registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> ELF64ArgGPRs&#91;&#93; = &#123;PPC::X3, PPC::X4, PPC::X5, PPC::X6,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           PPC::X7, PPC::X8, PPC::X9, PPC::X10&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ELF64NumArgGPRs = std::size(ELF64ArgGPRs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstUnallocGPR = State.getFirstUnallocated(ELF64ArgGPRs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstUnallocGPR == ELF64NumArgGPRs)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As described in 2.2.4.1 under the &quot;float&quot; section, shadow a single GPR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for single/double precision. ppcf128 gets broken up into two doubles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and will also shadow GPRs within this section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LocVT == MVT::f32 || LocVT == MVT::f64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">    State.AllocateReg(ELF64ArgGPRs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LocVT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a0c1ae89f2c2765a979f999ecdc11304c">is128BitVector</a>() || (LocVT == MVT::f128)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For vector and &#95;&#95;float128 (which is represents the &quot;vector&quot; section</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in 2.2.4.1), shadow two even GPRs (skipping the odd one if it is next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the allocation order). To check if the GPR is even, the specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// condition checks if the register allocated is odd, because the even</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// physical registers are odd values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((State.AllocateReg(ELF64ArgGPRs) - PPC::X3) % 2 == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">      State.AllocateReg(ELF64ArgGPRs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">    State.AllocateReg(ELF64ArgGPRs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="#afdaa3d0bfed7c804a0acc4c3563ab0ae"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#afdaa3d0bfed7c804a0acc4c3563ab0ae">CC&#95;PPC32&#95;SVR4&#95;Custom&#95;Dummy</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;ValVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;LocVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45">CCValAssign::LocInfo</a> &amp;LocInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> &amp;ArgFlags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;State) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66" lineLink="#a248c0ef85aa77ccc7b334368cdfdcd1c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a248c0ef85aa77ccc7b334368cdfdcd1c">CC&#95;PPC32&#95;SVR4&#95;Custom&#95;AlignArgRegs</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;ValVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;LocVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45">CCValAssign::LocInfo</a> &amp;LocInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> &amp;ArgFlags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;State) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> ArgRegs&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PPC::R3, PPC::R4, PPC::R5, PPC::R6,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PPC::R7, PPC::R8, PPC::R9, PPC::R10,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumArgRegs = std::size(ArgRegs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegNum = State.getFirstUnallocated(ArgRegs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip one register if the first unallocated register has an even register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number and there are still argument registers available which have not been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocated yet. RegNum is actually an index into ArgRegs, which means we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to skip a register if RegNum is odd.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegNum != NumArgRegs &amp;&amp; RegNum % 2 == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    State.AllocateReg(ArgRegs&#91;RegNum&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Always return false here, as this function only makes sure that the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unallocated register has an odd register number and does not actually</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocate a register for the current argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="#a456c0f0e7d096d3ce2776259dc92eb4d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a456c0f0e7d096d3ce2776259dc92eb4d">CC&#95;PPC32&#95;SVR4&#95;Custom&#95;SkipLastArgRegsPPCF128</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;ValVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;LocVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45">CCValAssign::LocInfo</a> &amp;LocInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> &amp;ArgFlags, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;State) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> ArgRegs&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PPC::R3, PPC::R4, PPC::R5, PPC::R6,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PPC::R7, PPC::R8, PPC::R9, PPC::R10,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumArgRegs = std::size(ArgRegs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegNum = State.getFirstUnallocated(ArgRegs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegsLeft = NumArgRegs - RegNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip if there is not enough registers left for long double type (4 gpr regs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in soft float mode) and put long double argument on the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegNum != NumArgRegs &amp;&amp; RegsLeft &lt; 4) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; RegsLeft; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      State.AllocateReg(ArgRegs&#91;RegNum + i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="#adeb8a5810db34abafbc7292378d15255"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#adeb8a5810db34abafbc7292378d15255">CC&#95;PPC32&#95;SVR4&#95;Custom&#95;AlignFPArgRegs</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;ValVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;LocVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45">CCValAssign::LocInfo</a> &amp;LocInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> &amp;ArgFlags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;State) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> ArgRegs&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PPC::F1, PPC::F2, PPC::F3, PPC::F4, PPC::F5, PPC::F6, PPC::F7,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PPC::F8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumArgRegs = std::size(ArgRegs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegNum = State.getFirstUnallocated(ArgRegs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is only one Floating-point register left we need to put both f64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values of a split ppc&#95;fp128 value on the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegNum != NumArgRegs &amp;&amp; ArgRegs&#91;RegNum&#93; == PPC::F8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    State.AllocateReg(ArgRegs&#91;RegNum&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Always return false here, as this function only makes sure that the two f64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values a ppc&#95;fp128 value is split into are both passed in registers or both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// passed on the stack and does not actually allocate a register for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split F64 arguments into two 32-bit consecutive registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="#aa881d2e727e6a14013435af6691a598e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aa881d2e727e6a14013435af6691a598e">CC&#95;PPC32&#95;SPE&#95;CustomSplitFP64</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;ValVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;LocVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45">CCValAssign::LocInfo</a> &amp;LocInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> &amp;ArgFlags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;State) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> HiRegList&#91;&#93; = &#123; PPC::R3, PPC::R5, PPC::R7, PPC::R9 &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> LoRegList&#91;&#93; = &#123; PPC::R4, PPC::R6, PPC::R8, PPC::R10 &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to get the first register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = State.AllocateReg(HiRegList);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i = 0; i &lt; std::size(HiRegList); ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HiRegList&#91;i&#93; == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = State.AllocateReg(LoRegList&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  (void)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> == LoRegList&#91;i&#93; &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Could not allocate register&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  State.addLoc(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a3213a94802bb4f87a3e388af6cdd9d7f">CCValAssign::getCustomReg</a>(ValNo, ValVT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, LocVT, LocInfo));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  State.addLoc(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a3213a94802bb4f87a3e388af6cdd9d7f">CCValAssign::getCustomReg</a>(ValNo, ValVT, LoRegList&#91;i&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         LocVT, LocInfo));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Same as above, but for return values, so only allocate for R3 and R4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="#a7a5fa20ecc7b5d7b962f4591ed563c17"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a7a5fa20ecc7b5d7b962f4591ed563c17">CC&#95;PPC32&#95;SPE&#95;RetF64</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;ValVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> &amp;LocVT,</span></CodeLine>
